overview: Chris Martin is a successful entrepreneur, business owner, and internet developer with years of expertise and first-hand experience in the fields of website development, internet sales management, and web-based business growth. Chris is the founder of Boston, MA based internet development firm Tugoso Consulting and is involved in a number of emerging web-based start-ups. In addition to his work on the web, Chris provides development and growth consulting services to businesses operating within the internet sales industry.
